smsSettings.body: Dear $recipientName$, please check your email for an important update regarding your account $recipientNumber$. - Altinn Team

emailSettings.subject: Important Update Regarding Your Account
emailSettings.body:
Dear $recipientName$,

We wanted to inform you about an important update to your account $recipientNumber$. Please log in to your dashboard to review the changes.

Best regards,
Altinn Team
